bronze:BronzeCore.NAME: Bronze Core
DESCRIPTIONS: The first #yFunction you create each combat costs #b0 until played.

bronze:ProtectiveGoggles.NAME: Protective Goggles
DESCRIPTIONS: If you end your turn with no cards in the #ySequence, gain #b4 #yBlock.

bronze:DecasWashers.NAME: Deca's Washers
bronze:DecasWashers.FLAVOR: It is unclear why Deca collects these.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, draw #b3 additional cards and add a #yDazed into your draw pile.

bronze:Timepiece.NAME: Timepiece
bronze:Timepiece.FLAVOR: From his collection of identical clocks.

bronze:Mallet.NAME: Mallet
bronze:Mallet.FLAVOR: That's it! I'm gettin me mallet!
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add #b2 copies of #yFine #yTuning+ to your hand.

bronze:SilverBullet.NAME: Silver Bullet
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with a #yPiercing #yShot in the #ySequence.

bronze:MakeshiftBattery.NAME: Makeshift Battery
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] and add a random #yStatus card into your discard pile at the start of your turn.

bronze:CableSpool.NAME: Cable Spool
DESCRIPTIONS: Add a copy of the first card you play with #yEncode each combat to the Sequence.

bronze:ElectromagneticCoil.NAME: Electromagnetic Coil
bronze:ElectromagneticCoil.FLAVOR: An inefficient but entertaining power source.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yFunctions are now made up of #b4 cards.

bronze:PlatinumCore.NAME: Platinum Core
DESCRIPTIONS: .[] NL The first #b3 #yFunctions you create each combat cost #b0 until played.

bronze:BottledCode.NAME: Bottled Code
bronze:BottledCode.FLAVOR: Actually, I have code for that exact thing...
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose a card with #yEncode. Start each combat with this card in the #ySequence.

bronze:DonusWashers.NAME: Donu's Washers
bronze:DonusWashers.FLAVOR: It is rather clear why Donu collects these.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain [E] [E] and add #b1 #yVoid into your draw pile.

bronze:BronzeIdol.NAME: Bronze Idol
bronze:BronzeIdol.FLAVOR: An ancient, weaponised antivirus - who knows who made it, and why?
DESCRIPTIONS: #yStatus cards may now be played for useful effects.

bronze:AnalyticalCore.NAME: Paradox Artifact
bronze:AnalyticalCore.FLAVOR: You've never seen a coding frenzy like this before.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, add a random card with Encode to your hand and give it Ethereal.
